medical_history.chief_complaint: Neurological symptoms including left upper extremity weakness, dizziness, visual changes, and facial tingling.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms were present at rest but paradoxically resolved with physical exertion. The patient had a history of long-term stability until recent worsening.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of preductal coarctation of the aorta repaired at age 10; echocardiogram revealing bicuspid aortic valve with moderate regurgitation and dilated left ventricle; worsening aortic insufficiency noted in MRI evaluations.
medical_history.social_history: Physically active male amateur hockey player.
